programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: An eerie red glow prompts the big eel to quickly let go of the Nautilus; a series of underwater volcanoes erupts and without power, the Nautilus keeps sinking towards the lava.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: The Ring of Fire reveals a clue to the fabled underwater city of Atlantis; a small party ventures out to discover what seems to be an ancient outpost of the mythical lost civilization.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: Elmo and Gabrielle use leaves and rocks found in nature to play tic-tac-toe; when Elmo's leaf pieces get blown away due to a strong wind, they find something else he can use.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: Nemo's recklessness leads to a mutiny under the ice; Nemo must tell his crew who he really is; Boniface takes over as captain.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: The Nautilus reaches the Pillars of Halvar but finds that the treasure is guarded by a fearsome band of Valkyrie warriors; they capture the crew in a stealth attack underwater; on trial for his life, Nemo must rely on the testimonies of the crew.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: The Nautilus crew spreads rumors that the East India Mercantile Company is failing; when stock prices plunge, a shareholder meeting is called; Nemo and crew have hours to scheme their way into that meeting, so they can dissolve the Company forever.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: In a penal colony, Nemo plans an escape on the submarine he designed; when ordered to move early, he leaves with few prisoners as crew, on their way, they collide with a ship.

programme.title: Nautilus
programme.desc: When Company troopers find the Nautilus, Nemo must motivate the team to work with each other so they can get to the open seas before they're exhausted.

programme.desc: Captain Nemo and his crew are forced to make a stop on the island of Karajan for water and supplies; Nemo discovers a truth and Humility and the crew find out who Nemo really is.
